description: Some of the most beautiful areas for kayaking and camping in North America: Prince Edward Island, Collins Inlet, Beaverstone Bay and the south edge of Killarney Provincial Park. Provides detailed information on access points, campsites, portages, shoals and shallows, points of interest, roads, hiking trails, and contours at a 1:30,000 scale. With colour photos describing routes, human and natural history, local attractions, and safety considerations. Made of waterproof material.
name: Adventure Map Philip Edward Island  & Area
